articles.author: Mark Giongco
articles.title: SEA Games: Irish Magno’s gold search continues with boxing silver - INQUIRER.net
articles.description:
MANILA, Philippines—Irish Magno’s quest for the gold continues after she lost to a familiar foe in the women’s flyweight final at the 31st Southeast Asian Games in Vietnam on Sunday.

articles.author: Kevin Liptak
articles.title: Biden offers message for Kim Jong Un as he wraps first leg of his Asia trip - CNN
articles.description: Before President Joe Biden concluded a visit to South Korea on Sunday, he offered a brief message to the nuclear-armed dictator to the north, who US officials believe could be preparing for a provocation during the US leader's visit to Asia.
